comment.author: 39312862@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Azaleas and Rhododendrons, and we'd love to have this added to the group! You can't imagine how excited I was to see this photo. I'm printing out the high resolution version and taking it over to the Conservatory of Flowers in Golden Gate Park to see who can recognize exactly where in the park this was taken. There are two mostly overgrown Rhododendron gardens in the east end of the park today.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
Great! It's a wonderful picture -- and makes me ready for spring...
Tiah

comment.author: 39312862@N00
comment._content: Spring has sprung in San Francisco - I'm very happy. All the flowering cherries, apples, etc. are in full bloom and I saw the first natives on my drive from SF to Bolinas today.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: There is a rhodie in full bloom next to the student union -- a great compliment to the bubblegum pink cherry trees!
